document_data.caption: The Trackless Sailfish
document_data.name: Sailfish
document_data.mainbody: '''Sailfish''' were a variety of fast moving species of [[fish]] that all bore a resemblance to [[swordfish]].
document_data.Description: All species of sailfish shared a characteristic incredibly high swimming speed, long bill, and dorsal fin that often stretched the entire length of their back.

Species.Trackless Sailfish: A variety of sailfish native to the [[Trackless Sea]]. Unlike other species of sailfish, they were seen as far north as the [[Sea of Moving Ice]], though in such waters their bodies moved at a slower rate than they were usually capable of.

Ecology.Habitats: Sailfish were typically found in warm bodies of water in the southern reaches of [[Faer√ªn]].

document_data.Trivia: In the kingdom of [[Koryo]], these creatures were the namesake of [[the Sailfish Inn]].
